General.Name: Sunvim Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunvim Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells home textile products in China, Asia, Europe, Americas, Australia, the Middle East, and internationally. Its home textile products comprise towels, bedding, and decorative articles. The company is also involved in real estate, heat and electricity, motor and other industries, as well as production, sales and service of industrial water and drinking water. The company sells its products through direct sales and online channels. Sunvim Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Gaomi, China.
